title: Nancy Pelosi Confronted LIVE by Mom Whose Son Was Killed by Illegal Alien… And LIES to Her
text:
The mainstream media typically hides the lies and corruption of liberal Democrats from the American people. 
But sometimes their lies are exposed for all to see…right on live TV. 
A mother whose son was brutally killed by an illegal alien Democrats protected confronted Nancy Pelosi during a CNN town hall on immigration Tuesday, asking the House Minority Leader an absolutely gut-wrenching question. 
“If you need to go home tonight and line up your babies, as you say, and your grandbabies, which one of them could you look in their eyes today and tell them that they are expendable for another foreign person to have a nicer life?” Laura Wilkerson asked. 
The mother continued: “Which one would you like to say, ‘You, my child, are expendable for someone else to come over here and not follow the law and have a nicer life.’” 
Pelosi first offered her condolences and prayers to the grieving mother and then outrageously claimed that illegal aliens in sanctuary cities are not breaking the law! 
“I do want to say to you that in our sanctuary cities, our people are not disobeying the law,” Pelosi said. “These are law-abiding citizens. It enables them to be there without being reported to ICE in case of another crime that they might bear witness to.” 
Wilkerson pushed back with another devastating question for Pelosi. 
“Will my son’s killer get sanctuary in your city once he’s let out of jail?” she asked. 
“Of course not,” Pelosi responded. She later said her son’s killer should be deported. 
The Democrat argued the point of sanctuary cities is to prevent law enforcement officers from acting as immigration officers. 
Wilkerson’s son, Joshua Wilkerson, was tied up, beaten and strangled to death . His body was then set on fire in a field in Texas. 
Adding insult to his mother’s suffering, his killer, Hermilo Moralez, was brought to the U.S. illegally by his parents when he was a child — but was protected from deportation by Barack Obama’s executive order protecting so-called “DACA” illegal aliens.

Why was he a free man on the streets? Because San Fransisco PROTECTED him from immigration authorities…refusing to report to ICE that he was here illegally. A “sanctuary” policy Pelosi and her Democrat party support. 
It is impossible that Pelosi does not know who Steinle was. Not only was she a S.F. resident.
